Tenant.title: Tenant
Tenant.description: Represents a tenant within the VeraMine Hub multi-tenant platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tenant entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the tenant was created.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the VeraMine Hub platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matching Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role within the tenant.

status.description: The status of the user account.

invitedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user invitation was sent.

joinedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user first logged in.

SiteConfiguration.title: SiteConfiguration
SiteConfiguration.description: Represents the configuration settings for a specific site within a tenant.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SiteConfiguration entity.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents a unified event ingested into the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Event entity.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the event occurred.

eventType.description: Type of the event (e.g., alarm, downtime, telemetry).

actor.description: The user or system that generated the event.

payload.description: A JSON string representing the event payload, which varies by eventType.

AiRecommendation.title: AiRecommendation
AiRecommendation.description: Represents an AI-suggested action with full audit trail.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AiRecommendation entity.

owner.description: The suggested owner of the recommendation.

impact.description: The potential impact of the recommendation.

confidence.description: The confidence level of the recommendation.

evidenceLinks.description: Links to the evidence supporting the recommendation.

verified.description: Indicates user feedback on the recommendation: true (accepted), false (rejected), or null (no feedback yet).

userId.description: ID of the user who triggered the generation (or 'system' if automated).

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the recommendation was generated.

model.description: The specific AI model used to generate the recommendation.

prompt.description: The full prompt sent to the AI model.

ShiftSummary.title: ShiftSummary
ShiftSummary.description: Represents a shift or day summary.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ShiftSummary entity.

siteId.description: The site to which this summary pertains.

startTime.description: The start time of the shift or day.

endTime.description: The end time of the shift or day.

sources.description: References to Events used to generate the summary.

Incident.title: Incident
Incident.description: Represents an incident within the VeraMine Hub platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Incident entity.

date.description: The date and time the incident occurred.

status.description: The current status of the incident.

reportedBy.description: The name of the person who reported the incident.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AlertRule entity.

configuration.description: JSON string containing the alert rule configuration.

enabled.description: Indicates if the alert rule is enabled or not.

Transport.title: Transport
Transport.description: Represents a vehicle in the fleet.

currentTrip.description: Identifier for the current trip or assignment.

/tenants/{tenantId}/users/{userId}.description: Stores user information, including their role within the tenant. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/siteConfigurations/{.description: Stores site-specific configurations. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/events/{eventId}.description: Stores ingested events. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/aiRecommendations/{a.description: Stores AI-suggested actions. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/shiftSummaries/{shif.description: Stores shift summaries. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/incidents/{incidentI.description: Stores incident data. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/alertRules/{alertRul.description: Stores alert rule configurations. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.

/tenants/{tenantId}/vehicles/{vehicleId}.description: Stores vehicle fleet data. Includes denormalized 'tenantId' for authorization independence.
